questions.quote: Yes, yes. Very smooth, super smooth. No, but I really wanna attack this thing, you know. Sink my teeth into it. So I was just wondering... what do you think would be the very best way to get started?
Yeah! Yeah. Hey--hey you, you know.. Maybe I'll call you sometime.
So that night I cut off the loops and the Executive was born.
